tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently visited Smilessence center for a dental check-up, and I was thoroughly impressed with the experience. The office was clean and modern, and the staff were friendly and welcoming from the moment I walked in. Dr. Shantanu jambhekar and Dr. Sonia jambhekar  they both are Incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to explain everything clearly during the examination. Dr. Shantanu Jambhekar He was gentle and made sure I was comfortable throughout the entire process. I appreciated Dr. Sonia Jambhekar how she addressed all my questions and concerns with patience and professionalism. Overall, I had a fantastic experience and would highly recommend Smilessence center to anyone looking for top-notch dental care.

review: I had a hip joint surgery and I was unable to walk without help. After the dental treatment Dr. Shantanu Jambhekar personally helped me to get down the staircase though my wife was with me. He is very soft spoken and helpful. Even his staff is also co-operative. Though we have shifted to the suburb, we still visit his clinic in Patel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Painless Single visit root canal treatment,
review:
On examining my tooth pain, 
Dr.Shantanu explained me in detail with pictures/x-rays the exact problem and the treatment required for the same. He made sure I was aware of what is going on exactly. He and his wife completed the Root Canal treatment smoothly and gently. Both are thorough professionals and have trained their team well too.  Excellent hygiene was maintained in the clinic and through out the entire treatment, a big relief during Times of Covid. They are the best!

Thank you, and all the best !
